question: Question_01_(a)
statement:
Write down the definition of the matrix norm $\|A\|$ of a matrix
\emph{A}.
sols:
The \emph{matrix} or \emph{operator norm} is defined as

\begin{align*}\left \| A \right \| = \max_{x:\, \left \| x \right \|\neq 0}\frac{\left \| Ax \right \|}{\left \| x \right \|}\end{align*}
